headline: Homes.com Will Be Profitable in 2030, CoStar Says. Investors Aren’t Thrilled.
summary: CoStar Group plans to reduce its net investment in listings site Homes.com by at least $100 million every year until 2030.

headline: CoStar Group Provides Full Year 2026 and Medium-Term Outlook with Significant Adjusted EBITDA Expansion
summary: ARLINGTON, Va., January 07, 2026--CoStar Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: CSGP), a leading provider of online real estate marketplaces, information, analytics, and 3D digital twin technology in the property markets, today provided an update on key business, financial, and corporate governance initiatives for 2026 and beyond, which have all been unanimously approved by the Company’s Board of Directors and its Capital Allocation Committee.
